Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Requires housing affordability impact notes in relation to certain rules
Summary: Requires housing affordability impact notes in relation to rules with the purpose or effect to increase or decrease the cost of constructing, purchasing, owning or selling a single family residence or a multi-unit housing development, either directly or indirectly.
LawCode: Add ยง202-g, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to requiring housing affordability impact notes in relation to certain rules
